com.air.mobilebrowser
Class TTSPlayer

java.lang.Object
  com.air.mobilebrowser.TTSPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnUtteranceCompletedListener
public class TTSPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnUtteranceCompletedListener

This class acts as a wrapper around a TextToSpeech and MediaPlayer to provide Play/Pause/Resume/Stop functionality for text to speech. Since the standard android TextToSpeech class does not itself support pause/resume, playback is handled by synthesizing the text to an audio file, then playing it back using a media player.

See Also:
TextToSpeech, MediaPlayer
